abstract: A calculation suggests that investors are attaching a 34 percent discount to the American company’s holding of Alibaba shares – assuming Yahoo’s core business is worth something. That’s too cautious, says Robert Cyran of Reuters Breakingviews.

headline.main: A Deep Discount on Yahoo’s Alibaba Stake Spinoff
